metadata.title: CVE-2022-24122 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
kernel/ucount.c in the Linux kernel 5.14 through 5.16.4, when unprivilegeduser namespaces are enabled, allows a use-after-free and privilegeescalation because a ucounts object can outlive its namespace.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
